title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Amir Khan "This fight is a little more personal"
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Amir Khan "This fight is a little more personal"
description:
Dan Rafael the longtime boxing writer has his own newsletter over at substack, he stops by to run through all the news of the last couple of weeks. They dive into the latest with Ryan Garcia and react to his surprising news, and what should Devin Haney's attitude be towards certain fights. Later in the show, Amir Khan joins Chris to discuss how his upcoming fight with Kell Brook and why this fight has more meaning for him.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
